1438880.name: Seaside Cafe Story Demo
1438880.description:
In Seaside Cafe Story, you are a promising young chef, dreaming of building your own cafe on a tropical island paradise.

Climb your way from obscurity to stardom with your skillful cooking and management.

Key Features:

  • Develop your cooking skills and specialize on cooking certain type of dish or just master all of them.
  • Manage the delicious and enticing food and drinks you are going to serve to the island's prospective customer.
  • Design and decorate your cafe with various decorations to cater to the increasing taste of your clientele.
  • Interact with your customers, reject outrageous demand or find the middle ground? Your choice!
  • Befriend and interact with the lively islanders and recruit them to help building your cafe empire.
  • Discover the story of the island! And more importantly try to:
  • Get rich.
  • And discover things even better than just getting rich!
